item.title: About
item.description:
I am a coffee and whisky lover with a passion for product development. I am a huge fan of watching movies from different parts of the world and experimenting different cusines. I spend time questioning why things are the way are.

My journey started of as a R developer doing basic analytics to building an edtech platform to currently working as a cybersecurity analyst.

You may find some of my work at my github profile

Know more about me on Linkedin
